name: The Hidden World (itch) (rhxchu)
description:
What is the Hidden World?

It is a vast land full of mountains and bodies of water! Walk through towns, plentiful trees, and explore a dungeon.

What Can You Do?

This is a world created for a World Design course. You can walk around and jump via a first-person point of view. There are a couple items to collect for fun, and there are a couple of buildings to enter as well. It is not a full game by any means. 

Try and find the object that doesn't belong! (aka a 3D model that doesn't look like an ordinary object)

Hint: if you hear rain, you're in the right place...
